Generate simulated datasets of IPD covariates and outcome for a trial

Source: R/gen_data.R
gen_data.Rd

Generate simulated datasets of IPD covariates and outcome for a trial

Usage

gen_data(N, b_trt, b_X, b_EM, b_0, meanX, sdX, event_rate, corX, allocation)

Arguments

N

Total number of patients

b_trt

b coefficient for active treatment vs. common comparator

b_X

b coefficients for each prognostic variable X

b_EM

b coefficients effect modifiers

b_0

Intercept coefficient

meanX

Mean of each normally-distributed covariate X

sdX

Standard deviation of each covariate X

event_rate

Event rate

corX

Covariate correlation coefficient of X

allocation

Allocation to active treatment as proportion of total; 0 to 1

Value

Data frame of X, trt and y

Examples


x <- gen_data(
 N = 100,
 b_trt = log(0.17),
 b_X = -log(0.5),
 b_EM = -log(0.67),
 b_0 = -0.62,
 meanX = 0.6,
 sdX = 0.4,
 event_rate = 0.35, 
 corX = 0.2,
 allocation = 2/3) 
#> Error in gen_data(N = 100, b_trt = log(0.17), b_X = -log(0.5), b_EM = -log(0.67),     b_0 = -0.62, meanX = 0.6, sdX = 0.4, event_rate = 0.35, corX = 0.2,     allocation = 2/3): could not find function "gen_data"

head(x)
#> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'x' not found
